name: Deploy C# App

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup .NET
        uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
        with:
          dotnet-version: 8.0.x

      - name: Build project
        run: dotnet publish ./csharp-app/YourCSharpProject.csproj -c Release -o ./publish

      - name: Deploy to Azure
        uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v2
        with:
          app-name: YourCSharpAppServiceName
          publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AZURE_PUBLISH_PROFILE_CSHARP }}
          package: ./publish
